377: Web and Graphic Designer (Remote - Eastern/Central Time) This opportunity is fully remote for candidates residing in the United States. The web design/development division of Intero Digital (formerly known as Minds On) is looking for a Web and Graphic Designer to join their team. This role places a strong emphasis on web and UI but also involves other marketing-related projects like social, web ads, infographics, layout, and more. Our ideal candidate is a problem solver who gets excited about working with multidisciplinary individuals—writers, content strategists, web developers, and account/project managers—in a collaborative, fast-paced environment. ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS AND RESPONSIBILITIES Design thoughtful, research-based and data-driven solutions for web, print, and video. Projects include but are not limited to: websites, user interfaces (UI), print advertisements, branding, PowerPoint presentations, brochures, catalogs, HTML emails, infographics, trade show displays, animated web ads, and more. Comfortably present project details and concepts through written, verbal, and visual presentations. Work with and manage communication with key stakeholders, including product owners, business teams, and outside partners/contractors. Proven ability to keep up with creative and B2B trends and apply new principles into design solutions. Lead brainstorming sessions and drive consensus across divisions. Design within set brand standards for a portfolio of clients across multiple industries. Manage project details and ensure the quality of each and every project. QUALIFICATIONS Minimum 2-3 years of agency experience in graphic design, web or UI/UX. Associates Degree or equivalent professional experience (preferably in art, graphic design, web design, or a related field). Proficiency in Sketch, Adobe Creative Suite, InVision, and other design tools. Comfort in Microsoft PowerPoint and Word. Experience working across teams to synthesize feedback and input. Experience presenting to and advising executive management. Working knowledge of graphic designing software in a Mac environment. Must present portfolio, sketches and other examples of their artistic ability. Ability to accept and implement constructive feedback from internal and external stakeholders. Experience building/designing sites directly within Shopify and WordPress is a strong plus. Team-oriented. Great cultural fit. This position description is intended to be dynamic and subject to change. Position requirements and essential functions may be altered from time to time based upon the needs of the organization and department. This position may be required to execute special projects or other related duties on occasion. COMPENSATION $65,000 to $80,000. Plus performance-based variable compensation opportunities.
